HTMLMediaElementCanPlayType.summary: The method canPlayType() reports how likely it is that the current browser will be able to play media of a given MIME type.

remarks.para:
-: Interface used to define the HTMLMediaElement.canPlayType() method
-
-Handling media support issues in web content
-Media type and format guide
-Codecs in common media types

HTMLMediaElementCanPlayType.returns:
A string indicating how likely it is that the media can be played.
The string will be one of the following values:
